readTracker.name: Read Tracker
readTracker.description: Track your reading time, manage books, set goals, and build better reading habits.

portfolioTracker.name: Portfolio Tracker
portfolioTracker.description: Manage your stock portfolio, track live prices, and monitor your investment performance.

signIn.description: Sign in with Google to sync your data across all your devices.

localMode.title: Use without login
localMode.description: You can use the app without signing in. Your data will be stored locally in your browser and will be lost if you clear your cache or switch devices.

sessions.noSessionsDesc: Start tracking your reading by adding your first session!

sessionForm.durationRequired: Reading time must be greater than 0
sessionForm.saveError: Failed to save session. Please try again.

sessionPrompt.title: Add Reading Session?

localMode.warning: You are using the app in local mode. Your data is stored only in your browser.
localMode.warningPoint1: Data will be lost if you clear your browser cache
localMode.warningPoint2: Data will not sync across devices
localMode.warningPoint3: Sign in with Google to sync your data across devices
localMode.title: Local Mode
localMode.description: Your data is stored locally in your browser
localMode.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all local data? This action cannot be undone.
localMode.syncError: Failed to sync data. Please try again.

syncModal.title: Sync Local Data
syncModal.message: You have local data. How would you like to sync it with your account?
syncModal.useAccountDesc: Keep your existing account data and discard local data
syncModal.mergeDesc: Add local data to your account (keeps existing account data)

syncConflict.title: Data Conflict
syncConflict.message: Your account already has data. How would you like to proceed?
syncConflict.useAccountDesc: Keep your existing account data and discard local data
syncConflict.useLocalDesc: Replace account data with your local data
syncConflict.mergeDesc: Keep all data from both sources
